column2: One of the original Dark Lords of Nagash, the Dread King was a mighty undead Liche of Nehekhara. A powerful warrior and practitioner of necromancy, he would become one of the most feared and mysterious beings to have ever existed
The Black Grail Knights were the resurrected corpses of twelve long dead Grail Knights of Bretonnia. They were among the mightiest Undead to have ever walked the Old World.
